arts.ttl: Cameron Brannagan set to miss minimum of six weeks with knee injury
arts.sum: CAMERON Brannagan will be out for a minimum of six weeks following the knee injury he suffered last weekend.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Oxford United: Sinclair Armstrong and Haydon Roberts shine
arts.sum: The right-back was troubled by the U’s attack and was caught on the counter attack a few times but came to the rescue to deny Dembele early in the second half. Like Knight, played a number of key passes forward in good areas.

arts.ttl: Oxford United beaten in reunion with Liam Manning
arts.sum: OXFORD United were made to pay for a lack of ruthlessness in front of goal as Bristol City came from behind to claim all three points.

arts.ttl: Nahki Wells on the spot to seal Bristol City’s win over Oxford
U’s boss gives injury update on Cameron Brannagan
arts.sum: CAMERON Brannagan looks set to miss out on Oxford United’s trip to Bristol City tomorrow afternoon.

arts.ttl: Bristol City vs Oxford predictions: Robins and U's both look vulnerable
arts.sum: Gareth Freeman believes that both teams have been less than convincing ahead of Saturday's Championship game between Bristol City and Oxford United, making the result difficult to predict.

arts.ttl: Mark Harris misses out on awards double scoop
arts.sum: MARK Harris has missed out on the double scoop of the Sky Bet Championship player and goal of the month awards.

arts.ttl: 38-year-old’s position at Bristol City under growing pressure, report claims
arts.sum: Bristol City boss Liam Manning’s position at Ashton Gate is under growing pressure, a report from Football Insider… The post 38-year-old’s position at Bristol City under growing pressure, report claims appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Des Buckingham addresses U’s reunion with Liam Manning
arts.sum: DES Buckingham has one message for the Oxford United fans travelling to Bristol City tomorrow – enjoy the game and get behind the team.
Aaron Ashley has taken a look at all of this weekend's Championship matches and provided a score prediction for each game.
